author: Reynold Akinboro
comment: But there are a few minor issues. The button to switch balls glitches, and doesn't work at times. The same problem happens with the power up button.  Also, there are some regular minor bugs, and on some rare occasions the game lags. Despite all of this, I give the game a 4/5 🌟 because it is insanely fun. Don't think twice, DOWNLOAD NOW.
title: Love it...

comment: One thing to improve on is loading and it eats too much battery but overall good for a watch game to show off.

author: Maverick Ignus
comment: Takes literally two minutes to load into the main menu. Game itself seems to be ported from a phone than made for the Wear as buttons are tiny, and the colors seemed to be washed out. Can't see the difference between a few colors. While the color blind skin is nice, the icons are a tad on the small side.
